name: ollama-local-test

user.systemPrompt: You are a developer with a bug to fix. Describe problems you're seeing and ask for help. Be concise - 1-2 sentences max.

agent.systemPrompt: You are a helpful coding assistant. Give concise debugging advice. 2-3 sentences max.

opening: I'm getting a weird type error in my TypeScript code. Something about 'Property content does not exist on type'. Any ideas?
